name: Touch!ボンバーマンランド
summary:
Bomberman Land Touch! (Touch! Bomberman Land in Japan) is a puzzle video game developed by Hudson Soft for the Nintendo DS handheld video game console.
Bomberman Land Touch! is the first Bomberman game in the Bomberman Land series to be officially released outside Japan, and the first Bomberman Land video game to use the square head Bomberman design found in most bomberman titles.
info:
• 中文名: 触摸！炸弹人大陆
  • 开发: ハドソン
  • 发行: ハドソン
  • 别名: Bomberman Land Touch!
  • 平台: NDS
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle, Party
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 8人
  • 发行日期: 2006年7月20日
